Leaves: Typical heath, small, elongated, in whorls of 4 on stems, densely overlapping.
Flowers: Small, urn-shaped, bright pink, in groups of 4 at the end of branches. Forming large masses in peak floweirng.
FruitSeeds: Small round capsules releasing many seeds.
DistinguishingFeatures: Combination of features distinguish from other heaths.
